invention-title: Preparation method and application of electronic copper electroplating raw material
电子电镀铜原料的制备方法与应用

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of electrocoppering raw material preparation, and discloses an electronic electrocoppering raw material and a preparation method and application thereof.The preparation method comprises the steps that anodic oxidation reactions such as oxygen evolution of an electrolyte in the process of preparing metal copper through electrolysis of crude copper salt or waste copper liquid are replaced with hydrogen anodic oxidation reactions, and therefore electrolysis energy consumption can be greatly reduced; potential safety hazards caused by gases such as hydrogen and oxygen or chlorine generated in the electrolytic reaction can be eliminated; the prepared ultra-pure metal copper can be used as an anode raw material of an electrolytic tank for electrolyzing ultra-pure copper sulfate and sulfuric acid electroplating basic liquid, and the ultra-pure copper sulfate and sulfuric acid electroplating basic liquid or copper sulfate raw material for electronic copper electroplating is obtained through electrolysis again. The ultrahigh-purity copper metal and the ultrahigh-purity copper sulfate are continuously recovered and prepared by adopting a synchronous coupling electrolysis method, so that the production cost can be reduced, the process flow is simplified, the production efficiency is improved, the energy consumption is greatly reduced, and the production safety is improved.

本发明涉及电镀铜原料制备技术领域，且公开了一种电子电镀铜原料及其制备方法与应用，制备方法包括步骤：将电解粗铜盐或废铜液制金属铜时电解液的析氧等阳极氧化反应用氢气阳极氧化反应替代，不仅可以大幅度降低电解能耗，而且可以消除电解反应中产生氢气和氧气或氯气等气体带来的安全隐患；制备得到的超高纯金属铜可作为电解制超高纯硫酸铜+硫酸电镀基础液电解槽的阳极原料，再次进行电解得到电子电镀铜的超高纯硫酸铜+硫酸电镀基础液或硫酸铜原料。本发明采用同步耦合电解的方法连续回收制备超高纯铜金属和超高纯硫酸铜，可以降低生产成本，简化工艺流程，提高生产效率，大幅降低能耗，提高生产安全性。
